title: How to Make Pipe Cleaner Stick Figure People

steps.headline: Align two pipe cleaners side by side in even lengths.
steps.description: Twist them around each other, starting one-third from the top, ending one-third from the bottom.

steps.headline: Bend arms and legs into any shape you like.
Twist a pipe cleaner twice around the tip of your index finger.
steps.description: Loop the end of the cleaner under each arm to form the head.

text: Align two pipe cleaners side by side in even lengths. Twist them around each other, starting one-third from the top, ending one-third from the bottom. Bend arms and legs into any shape you like.  Twist a pipe cleaner twice around the tip of your index finger. Loop the end of the cleaner under each arm to form the head.
